thread.title: Fit and beautiful wins the race
thread.title_full: Fit and beautiful wins the race

title: Fit and beautiful wins the race
text:
Fit and beautiful wins the race Finalists of Miss Universe Malaysia 2017 parading in their activewear by Ash Be Nimble. 
ALL eyes were on the runway as the Miss Universe Malaysia 2017 finalists sashayed in dressed in colourful swimwear by Malibu Beachwear at Zouk Club Kuala Lumpur. 
Competition was neck-and-neck for the coveted subsidiary title of Miss Body Beautiful 2017. 
Dana Low, 22, bagged the title by ticking all the boxes – she had stage presence and personality, a good physique as well as did well on the catwalk. 
“I didn’t expect this at all. I was nervous, but told myself to go out and have fun,” said Low from Selangor. 
On her take on what beautiful body meant, she said confidence was key. 
“It is not just about how you look, but also the confidence in carrying yourself that makes one beautiful,” she said. 
Low, who just completed a bachelor’s degree in Communications, said there was a time in her life when she was not very confident. 
Building self-esteem, for her, was through finding herself, trying new things and doing the things she was passionate about. 
The girls also flaunted their sporty side as they strutted in front of judges and guests, dressed in Ash Be Nimble activewear. 
Other subsidiary titles given out that night included Miss Online Personality, which went to 23-year-old Sonia Naidu from Sarawak for her effective and strategic engagement and communication in social media. 
Karshini Ghanesh, 20, from Johor, won Miss Congeniality, while Samantha Katie James, 23, became the face of Ash Be Nimble as well as La Juiceria.
